meanings.definition: Of or relating to the jejunum.
meanings.sent1: The jejunal lining helps with digestion.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the jejunal tissue for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: The jejunal section of the small intestine was feeling a bit shy today.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of the jejunal functions was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant color of the jejunal area stood out during the surgery.

meanings.definition: Located in or affecting the jejunum.
meanings.sent1: The jejunal cells absorbed the nutrients efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The infection was found in the jejunal region.
meanings.sent3: The jejunal part of the digestive system decided to take a vacation.
meanings.sent4: His words had a jejunal impact on her understanding.
meanings.sent5: The jejunal activity could be seen on the medical scan.
